Loved this top so much, I bought another. I get lots of compliments. If you’re petite (like me), the length may be a bit long but it is still cute. I would have ordered an XS if that were an option, but they only have Small.  Nice, soft fabric and wrinkle resistant.

I washed the blouse on the gentle cycle, dried it in the dryer, and it came out looking perfect. I like the colors, the neckline, and the fit is perfect as well.  For winter, I'll wear this with a sweater. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.

I midweight knit shirt.  Fits like a size L, 14, and has a full cut through tummy and hips. Tunic length on my (5' tall).  3/4 sleeves with elastic are comfortable.  Print is pretty.  What I was wanting--a shirt to wear to the grocery store and to run errands, etc. that wasn't as warm as my sweaters but still good for fall/winter/spring when it's still 60ish.  Because I'm short and it's full in hips, I may put a strip of elastic on the sides to create some ruching up the side seams.
I've now purchased three in different colors.

The fit is a little snug, I’d probably size up. The color is pretty and the material is nice.
I really love this top. I went through my closet and got rid of tops I don’t wear. This top is so nice for work. I got several.

It was a full size smaller than the blue one! I have returned it and ordered an XXL, so we’ll see how that turns out. The colors in the top listed as red and white floral are actually more fall colors - burnt orange and coral tones, which is what I wanted. The tops are soft and have stretch.
Great quality great fit.  A nice quality fabric that is soft.  Easy to wash.

评论详情: This shirt is made from shiny, thick polyester knit fabric. It reminds me of the clothes my grandmother used to buy at Montgomery Wards. If you're going for that Alfred Dunner look, this is the shirt for you.

This top is okay - it is a thinner material and it's either made to fit slimmer, or it runs small.  I wanted to like the detail on the sleeves but it felt cheesy when I put it on.  The color was okay, quality was fine.

评论详情: This is a very pretty top with feminine flowers and elegant colors. I wear an 18W/20W/44D and found the XXL (my usual size) to run just a bit snug, especially through the tummy. I appreciate the length of the sleeves - I have shorter arms, so full length sleeves often hang down over my hands, but these 3/4 sleeves look and fit well.
this shirt quality is amazing and so comfortable. i love the design and colors and true to size

类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: Large
评论详情: I love the pattern on this shirt but the sizing runs very small.  The fabric has very little stretch to it. If you have a larger chest or waist, this will not flatter your figure. The colors in the pattern are very pretty though. I would have gotten the next size up but the neckline on the smaller size was already too wide, so I didn't think that would be any better going up in size.
Nice looking too but too small in sleeved & waist.
The fabric, sleeves and neckline were perfect !
Not terrible but the shoulders were more narrow than similar shirts I've purchased. I kept the shirt but I don't feel comfortable when I wear it.

I dunno, maybe the shirt a received was mis-sized.  I ordered my normal size large and it was way too snug.  I like the top and will return for an XL.  I do agree the quality is great.  I like the boat-neck...different and fun.
I ordered 2 of these. One was fine, the other was in a ripped open bag and wadded up inside. When I took it out, it was also stained.
the shirt is pretty but more like a large ham an XL…it has to go back.
Not 2X, more like L. So tired of ordering plus size tops from Amazon and have to return every one.

评论概述: Nice Style Runs Small Size up
评论详情: I am usually a small but that size was too tight on my 38B size chest, so I preferred a medium, and the size was still small across my chest. Otherwise, I liked the shirt, but if you are bigger than a size 34 chest,  the size small will not fit, but the medium should work. The size large would not work for me either, as the shirt would be too big in the arms and waist. Wishing you good luck with the fit!

This top is very similar to the viral Dokotoo top from Tiktok. It's almost the same, but the sleeves are cut differently and the neckline is a boat neck. This top fit a little differently, but it is still cute and stylish. The elastic around the 3/4 sleeves is a nice touch and the color is great. Not a 100% dupe, but pretty close!

The color/ design looks very much like the Lily Pulitzer style without the price tag. The sleeves are a comfortable "smocking" that is not too tight and stays up when you push up your arm.  The material is fairly lightweight making it a nice summer shirt. The length is long enough to tuck for a casual look. Overall a cute shirt especially for the price.

My mother fell in love with the pattern and fit of this top. There's plenty of stomach room so that if you feel bloated, you can still hide your imperfections. The sleeves have this stretchy cuff elasticity so that you can roll them up. mid way rather than folding them up. It's a nice casual summer top. The crew neck is very conservative. It can be very well dressed up as a work top. Material is soft and breathable. Follow the sizing chart - it's accurate.

评论概述: Beautiful blouse! Excellent price! Perfect present! Thank you!
评论详情: Beautiful blouse! Excellent price! Perfect present! Thank you!

评论概述: Beautiful top looks like a Lilly Pulitzer
评论详情: I love this top. It fits true to size. I'm 5 51/2 and weigh 143 and I got a medium and it fits perfectly.  The colors are vibrant and the material has some stretch to it. It's not too long, but definitely isn't cropped. It reminds me so much of a Lilly Pulitizer top I have, for a fraction of the price. I would definitely recommend this top. Lots of colors to choose your bottoms from.
The fabric is so lightweight and soft. It fits pretty well. The upper arms and shoulders are a bit tighter than I find comfortable. The neckline is cute and stylish. Pattern is fun and summery.

Nice, comfortable top!  It fits true to size and didn't shrink after washing and drying in machines.  The green is as shown--not what I think of as grass green but a softer and prettier green.  It seems well-made and looks good on.

This blouse is quite soft and comfortable!  The pattern is very pretty although I'm not 100% a fan of the smocking on the arms, but I suspect I'll get over that haha.  The cut of the blouse is done well (I'm busty with a big butt) and the fabric is thin - not see-through thin but warmer-weather thin.  It's machine washable and dryable which is #1 in my book - I'm not handwashing anything!  For 20 bucks (price at the time of this review), I think it's a great value.  On par with a blouse you would find at Penney's or Kohl's or similar but half the price.

I really like this top.  It’s shapely and a cute design especially around the boat neck.  The elastic on the sleeves is very comfortable too.The material is thicker in weight.  I feel like it’s almost too hot to wear in the summer.  It’s also not stretchy so pick your size carefully.  I’ve got a 36” bust and am a size 8.  I was between sizes so I went down and ordered a small.  It just fits and is really almost form fitting.It’s a lovely well made top and at a reasonable price.

Since I like 3/4 length sleeves instead of full length, I wanted to try this IECCP 3/4 Length Sleeve top. The blue color is vivid and rich. The smocking on the sleeves is comfortable. It stays in place without being constricting. Overlapping at the shoulders finishes the boat neck nicely. I like the length and the fabric is soft and stretchy. Comfort is definitely a plus. I laundered it according to the tag directions and it looks great. It was laundered prior to my pictures. As you can see in my pictures, since it is so stretchy, the pockets of my pants and the bra lines show. It is a bit clingy, but not transparent. This is a good basic top to wear layered as well as alone.

评论概述: Attractive shirt.  Medium weight knit jersey fabric.
类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: Medium
评论详情: This is an attractive 3/4 Length Sleeve shirt from IECCP.  I got the Color: A- White Red Floral and I very much like the colors and pattern.  The fit of this shirt is flattering.  The boat neckline fabric overlap is sewn in place, so the neckline keeps it shape.  The elastic cuffs fit just below my elbows and ride up to my elbows, making a small pretty poof.  The elastic fits nicely and is not restricting.  The hem hit nicely for wearing untucked and is a curved hem (not straight across.) The fabric is a soft jersey knit.  It is a polyester/rayon/spandex blend, so it will not shrink and should be easy care. The jersey knit is a medium weight and not very breathable.  I will be wearing this shirt in the Fall, not in the heat of Summer. For reference:  I am 5’4” tall, weigh 134 lbs. and wear a 36D bra.  I got a medium and it fits perfectly without being clingy or too loose.  My husband thinks it looks great on me and would make a good “casual date night” shirt.
love the colors on this shirt. It is very vibrant and very reminiscent of the 80's. Fits true to size. I am 5'1" and wear an 18(ish) usually. Nice sleek material that is very breezy.

I chose the purple colored shirt and I absolutely love it. I used the size guide to pick my size which is a large. It fits as expected and true to size. The value for the money is excellent I am impressed with the details of the sleeves and feel of the material. It is easy to care for I used regular wash and dry. I accidentally left it in the dryer and it looked wrinkled but the wrinkles shook right out. It's a shirt you can dress up or down. It's a win win.

评论概述: Great top with a fun pattern for warmer months
评论详情: Disclaimer: I did receive this via the Vine program, and my thanks to the manufacturer and Amazon for providing it for review! My wife wasn't sure at first about this, saying it's not really her style. Then a couple of days later, she came home from the mall, having bought a pair of floral-patterned capris that match this top! The material is light and perfect for warmer weather, and it's stitched together very well. True to size.

评论概述: Sleeves and neckline make this shirt unique
评论详情: I really like this shirt!  The fabric is flattering and comfortable/soft, the neckline is pretty unique and the ruched sleeves make it more than just a standard tee.  The color is just gorgeous (I got the grass green).  It will pair very well with jeans, but could also top a casual skirt or leggings.  It was pretty true to size, so you shouldn't have any sizing surprises, at least based on my experience.  Happy to have this in my "I actually have to leave the house today" wardrobe rotation.

Great top in a lovely purple that is flattering and not garish.  The sleeves and overall look are very on trend right now.  It fits well and is well made.  It works for work or casual wear.  It does come wrinkled so needs a steaming or lower heat ironing but overall I'm very pleased with the top.
Love this top. It’s a rich purple color, flattering cute and tucks in nicely. A great addition to my wardrobe!

评论概述: Recommend to size up, not as long as it looks in the description pictures
类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: X-Large
评论详情: I ordered XL since that is my regular size and matched the sizing chart but the shirt fits like a Large. I can wear it but it is a bit too tight around the chest area. Also I'm a tall person so the elastic part of the sleeve ends up being at the bend of the elbow so it feels a bit uncomfortable, I have to raise it up a bit to make it feel better. Also the length of the shirt is not as it looks on the model, it ends bellow my waist but it does not cover my hips, so it is not tunic length like it looks on the model pictures. Overall is a nice shirt, I love the earthy patterned print, but if you prefer it look baggier like in the model might need to size up. Also I'm not sure I would've paid 20dlls for it if I had seen it at a store. The fabric is soft polyester but it is too short, unless it was made for petite people and that is not clearly defined in the description.
This looks much better on the screen than it does in person.  I think it has little to no shape to it.

I ordered the IECCP 3/4 length sleeve womens' top in size XL for my wife who is 5'5" and considers herself an apple shape.  The shirt arrived in a plastic bag, and was remarkably unwrinkled.  She tried it on and it fits true to size, if you are in-between sizes, size up.The shirt is 60% Polyester, 35% Rayon and 5% Spandex, the hand-feel is very soft.  The detailing around the neckline (the shoulder seam dips towards the front of the shirt and overlaps the back) adds interest.  The print is bright and bold, not quite as subtle as the picture would suggest.  The smocking on the sleeves is well-done, not too loose, and not too tight.  I note no loose threads or wonky seams.  Another nice feature is the tagless neckline.My wife will likely style this shirt with jeans or leggings, it's a good, basic piece that might look great with a vest as well because of the smocking on the sleeves.  The price seems fair, 5 stars.

This blouse can be worn most of the year, except really cold winter weather. It has a roomy, comfortable fit without feeling bulky. It's lightweight enough to tuck in. The elastic around the sleeves is comfortable and doesn't dig into my skin. I ordered the grass green color, which looks more like sage in the photos. In person, it is a little more green (heather greenish/sage), and slightly darker, but still looks sage enough that I like it. It's still a light color, just not quite what is shown. It's well-made and suitable for any age or size. It's kind of a casual style, but if it was paired with the right bottoms and accessories, it could be worn to work also.

评论概述: Sure cute and true to colors
评论详情: I love this cute shirt. It feels like spring and summer. The colors are just as wonderful as product photo depicts. It is a stretchier material. If you want it a little looser, I would size up. Medium fits me well but I do wish it was a little bigger. I would say it is true to size. Product has held up in the wash.  10/10 would recommend and get again. Super cute shirt.

类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: X-Large
评论详情: This brightly printed, light weight blouse is silky and comfy to wear. I like the unique details on the shoulders and sleeves as they make the shirt look special. The material is soft with a loose feel that isn’t clingy and the length hits me right at the waist. It’s also machine washable. The blouse is versatile- I can wear it year round as it’s thin enough to be layered with a jacket and the 3/4 sleeves are suitable for any weather. It’s also appropriate for work and weekends.

I am a solid ladies US L or XL on top (38B) and a 14/16 on bottom, standing 5’9”. When I order tops from Amazon, I usually get XL or XXL. For this, I got the XXL and it fits just fine!  The fabric is 60% poly, 35% rayon, and 5% spandex. It feels sleek and smooth. The underside of the fabric is white, as shown in my vid.  The sleeve length is a nice 3/4. The ruching (sp?) is cute and the ruffle at the end is a nice touch, though you can see the white underside of the fabric.  The boat neck goes pretty high up (which isn’t my fav). The stripes don’t line up on the sides so if that type of thing bugs you, you may want to pass.  Otherwise I really like this!
Nice material, just too large

This summer top is just perfect look shirt. I am Uk size medium and I place order of L size which for accurate on me. Sleeves are so stylish and comfortable. Boat neck given modern look to me and I receive lots of praise from family and friends.
I really like this top. The fabric is good quality and it fits really well. The sizing is accurate. It washes well too.  Very pleased and definitely recommend.

The IECCP 3/4 Length sleeve women's top is a fantastic addition to any wardrobe! The trendy boat crew neck and smocked design create a chic, sophisticated look that’s perfect for both work and casual outings. The fabric is comfortable and breathable, making it ideal for summer wear. The 3/4 sleeves add a touch of elegance while providing a bit of arm coverage. The fit is flattering and versatile, easily pairing with skirts or pants. I’m impressed with the quality and style of this blouse—it effortlessly combines fashion and function. Highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their summer wardrobe!
My wife really liked this top. Well made, soft and a great bold colour. She is size 8 and it fitted nicely and is intensionally a little loose. Recommended.
This is a lovely top, Fits me well, Lovely design, Nice colour. Lovely material, Well made, Washes well, Looks great on

The quality of the fabric and the stitching were neat and good. The neckcut is a bit high, I felt it didn't suit me well. I liked the gathering sleeve. The top is true to size, fits me well and is comfortable. The top size is of the right length. I felt it's a bit pricey though. Great as a casual wear.
No loose stitching on this top. The sleeves are cuffed at the bottom and go past the elbows. The length of the top is just right Sizing is accurate.

I recently ordered the IECCP 3/4 Length Sleeve Women's Top for my wife, and it has quickly become one of her favourite pieces in her wardrobe. She absolutely loves the colour and style, which are both perfect for the summer.  The boat crew neck and smocked design give the top a trendy and sophisticated look, making it suitable for both work and casual outings. My wife pairs it effortlessly with trousers for a polished business casual look and with shorts for a more relaxed, yet chic, look. The versatility of this top is one of its best features, allowing her to dress it up or down as needed.  The fabric is comfortable and lightweight, ideal for warm weather. The 3/4 length sleeves add a touch of elegance and provide just the right amount of coverage. The top is well-made and has held up nicely through several washes, retaining its shape and colour.  Overall, the IECCP 3/4 Length Sleeve Women's Top is a fantastic item. It’s stylish, versatile, and well-suited for a variety of occasions. My wife is very pleased with it.
This black top with three quarter length sleeves is good quality and comfortable to wear. It fits well and is well made. It washes well too. I'm very pleased with it.

This was ordered specifically for a holiday but it has had plenty of use since. The manufacturing quality is OK as is the sizing and my wife finds it a comfortable top which has proved to be OK as all day wear and something to change in to on a hot holiday evening.

I ordered a black top in Medium to wear for work. The materiel is nice and thick (not see through) and does not crease and I like the high neckline, which is perfect for the Office. The sleeves detailing on the sleeves adds a bit of interest.  Size medium was a reasonable fit for a large size 14, although pulls slightly at the bust.  The top is currently retailing at just over £25 which is probably more than I would normally pay for a similar item.

There are so many things I love about this pretty top — the flattering boat neckline, the 3/4 length, ruched-cuff sleeves, and the bright, colorful pattern, to name just a few.  Made from a blend of polyester, viscose and elastane, the fabric is soft and stretchy, and a little bit thicker than I would wear in summer. But, I’d say considering the sleeve length that it’s more a crossover season garment anyway.  Sizing is accurate with Large equivalent to a size 14.  Very comfortable to wear and matches well with most solid colors.

Nice the design, suitable for work or casual outings, but overall I was a bit disappointed.  The top is smaller than expected. I would recommend ordering a size up to ensure a comfortable fit.  The price, at currently £25.46, definitely on the high side, especially considering the sizing issues and the overall quality.  While the fabric is fair quality, it doesn’t quite match the expectations set by the price.  Unfortunately I wouldn't recommend this top.

This is a lovely little top for the cooler days of summer, or paired with a cardigan in colder months. The elastic on the sleeves is very gentle, so it doesn’t pinch (which is a bonus for someone like me who constantly rolls their sleeves above their elbow!). The neckline is comfortable, and the whole garment is a good length. The purple colour is a gorgeous shade. Very happy.
I love this top, the high neckline suits me, it is a very soft material and pretty pattern. Looks very flattering on; and true to size. Very pleased with it.

I just don’t like the shiny polyester blend fabric - it cheapens it, and although it’s soft, it feels hot and clingy against my skin.  I prefer more breathable fabrics like viscose, or natural materials like cotton or linen, but that’s just personal preference of course.  However, the design is very pretty, light and colourful, and the shape is lovely, with a flattering neckline and elasticated cuffs, which can be easily pulled up to your elbows, allowing the loose fabric to float down in a lantern style sleeve. It’s a little overpriced, in my opinion, particularly as it’s only polyester but then again it’ll wash and dry quickly and easily without crumpling.  A good top for spring and autumn, and cooler days in summer - I don’t think I’d wear it on hot days as the fabric would be too clingy on my skin.

I love this top, the colour, style and fit are perfect and the elastic cuff is a really nice touch. The material is a nice soft quality t-shirt material which is really flattering. This works great with jeans for a smart casual look but I could see me dressing this up for a date night with my husband. The material is thick enough to wear alone on warmer days or add a jacket or cardigan for the cooler months Graet value for money.

I love this top, the colour, style and fit are perfect and the elastic cuff is a really nice touch. The material is a nice soft quality t-shirt material which is really flattering. This works great with jeans for a smart casual look but I could see me dressing this up for a date night with my husband. The material is thick enough to wear alone on warmer days or add a jacket or cardigan for the cooler months Graet value for money.

This summer sleeve top is lovely and the material is very soft to wear next to the skin.  I ordered a large for my size UK14 and fits to perfection  Made very well with no loose threads  I have the pink/ purple stripes and it is a lovely colour.  My neck is quite slim, so the top does fit well and I have no tight feeling  The length comes around the waist and airy  There is a little bit of stretch  The arms at the end are more frilly or rusched, I am not usually a fan, but it does make the top more interesting and the arms can be pushed up for comfort.  I have worn this top several times now, and had no issues with washing it in a lower temperature.  Quite smart and can be worn any time day or night.  I really like it.  ⭐️Thank you to the seller.

类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: Small
评论详情: I’m really pleased with this top, which is more comfortable than I thought it would be given its composition. It’s a very nice lightweight top that isn’t see-through in any way. The ruching at the sleeves is a really pretty detail, and I think it elevates this top. The neckline is also nicely open. The pattern is pretty, and it looks great paired with jeans. I got the white-red floral design, and I’m genuinely pleased with it. I would definitely recommend this top!

It is synthetic, but it feels nice quality fabric and the workmanship is good. I'm a size 8 32B and the 'S' fits me the same as the model in the picture. I like the cross over design of the neck which reduces the size of the neck hole a bit (this year I'm finding other bateau necklines are so wide they almost fall over my shoulders!). It's been through the wash and it hasn't twisted at all, the seams are still straight. The pink/green colour is more flattering than the photos suggest. It has all the wearability of a t-shirt, but the sleeve shirring elevates it to something a little more special. The current price seems a little high at £23, hence after much deliberation I have dropped a star.

This is a pretty, flattering top. I love the sleeves, the elastic keeps them nicely in place but isn't too tight. The fit is good, I got size Small and wear sizes 8-10 normally. The boat neck is too wide for my liking as all my bra straps show underneath. The fabric is quite shiny, which combined with the bright print does look a little cheap in my opinion.

I got size Small and normally wear size 8-10. The material feels very nice, and I like the sleeves - they stay up well and there are no annoying buttons. The boat neck is very wide so you need to be careful what bra you wear underneath, all of mine with straps seem to show. The cut is quite big and shapeless, there's lots of extra material under the arm even though I got the smallest size.

I ordered the apricot black floral top. It is definitely cream and not apricot. I am a size 16 and ordered an XL. The fit was ok. I would have preferred more natural fibres in the composition as it is 60% polyester. In saying that, the fabric was soft and smooth. The neckline goes more or less straight across the neck so if like me, you don't like anything touching your neck, then it's not for you.

类型: Color: A- White Red FloralSize: Medium
评论详情: This top is made from a good quality material. The fabric of this top is very soft and feels very comfortable for a longer time. The top is made from 60% Polyester, 35% Rayon, and 5% Elastane.  This top looks beautiful with a floral design on the white base design. This top is a little long hence comfortable to wear with leggings too. This top also goes well with denim.  It has a different neck which makes it the same at the front and back. The fabric has a good stretch. this top has 3/4 sleeves with elastic at the end.  This is a nice option for daily use but this is definitely not an occasional wear.  This top is true to its size.  Overall it is a nice top.
A really nice summery top.  The style, colours and quality were all really nice and very true to size.  Thoroughly recommend this beautiful top.

I was far more impressed by this top than I expected to be.  I chose royal blue and the colour is lovely and vibrant.  I am a size 16 and opted for XL and it was nice and roomy and I could actually have sized down but it's nice to occasionally have a looser fit top.  The fit Is very flattering as it skims and does not cling.  The fabric is a lovely, soft almost jersey-like material.  It's got a nice slash neck top with detailing at the shoulder and shirring at the cuffs which are very comfortable and don't dig.  It's not too long in length but does cover a mum-tum or can be tucked in.  The images on the listing are true to life so I don't feel the need to add a photo to my review.  I'm actually considering buying this top in another colour as it is so comfortable and flattering for every day wear.

The loose styling, boat neckline and attractive sleeves with elasticated cuffs add interest and take it out of the ordinary.  The material is a soft nylon with a sheen which feels nice against the skin.- it is medium weight and not at all clingy or see-through.
